verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:38
verses.text: And Obed–edom with their brethren, threescore and eight; Obed–edom also the son of Jeduthun and Hosah to be porters:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:39
verses.text: And Zadok the priest, and his brethren the priests, before the tabernacle of the Lord in the high place that was at Gibeon,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:40
verses.text: To offer burnt offerings unto the Lord upon the altar of the burnt offering continually morning and evening, and to do according to all that is written in the law of the Lord, which he commanded Israel;
